Description.Title: Photoperiod (SIMPLACE component)
Description.Authors: Gunther Krauss; Andreas Enders; adapted from BIOMA by Davide Fumagalli
Description.Institution: Crop Science Group, University of Bonn, Katzenburgweg 5, 53115 Bonn, Germany
Description.ExtendedDescription: Computes a daily photoperiod response factor (0–1) used to scale thermal time based on day length, following the CropSyst approach (Stockle, Donatelli, Nelson, 2003). Inputs: iPhotoInhibition (h; critical photoperiod), iPhotoInsensitivity (h; base photoperiod where development is insensitive), iDayLength (min). Method: let DLh = iDayLength/60. If iPhotoInsensitivity ≤ iPhotoInhibition then PhotoPeriodFactor = (iPhotoInhibition − DLh)/(iPhotoInhibition − iPhotoInsensitivity); else PhotoPeriodFactor = (DLh − iPhotoInhibition)/(iPhotoInsensitivity − iPhotoInhibition). The result is clamped to [0,1]. Implemented in SIMPLACE (LGPL-3.0-or-later); logic imported from BIOMA. References: CropSyst, European Journal of Agronomy 18:289–307 (DOI: 10.1016/S1161-0301(02)00109-0). Project info: http://www.simplace.net.
Description.ShortDescription: Linear photoperiod response factor (0–1) from day length and cultivar thresholds, per CropSyst/BIOMA, to scale thermal time.
